pageContext.claim: “Democrats bowed at the feet of special interests and trapped your children in failing government schools. You look at the schools, worst schools. And we're making a lot of progress, but you have the worst schools of anybody in the country by -- by far. It's not even close.”
pageContext.analysis: New Mexico is considered to have the worst performing schools in the country. Trump was not in New Mexico when he made this comment. He was speaking to an African-American audience but New Mexico does not have a large African-American population.
